sentences.sContent: Alcoholism affects all aspects of family life.
sentences.sCn: 酗酒影响家庭生活的各个方面。

sentences.sContent: The storm outside gave the room a sinister aspect.
sentences.sCn: 外面的暴风雨使房间里变得阴森可怕。

remMethod.val: a+spect(看)→看人不能看外表→样子， 外表

trans.tranCn: (问题等的)方面；样子, 外表, 面貌
trans.tranOther: one part of a situation, idea, plan etc that has many parts
